1992 NBA Playoffs Summary

1991 Playoffs Summary 1993 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Chicago Bulls

Finals MVP: Michael Jordan (35.8 / 4.8 / 6.5)


1992 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Michael Jordan (759)

TRB: Horace Grant (194)

AST: John Stockton (217)

WS: Michael Jordan (4.1)
